Desc.entry: A local agent for many of the large aids and equipment manufacturers. Products can be viewed at the shop or in the home on request. Items available to hire include wheelchairs and high seat chairs. Items available to buy include: elbow crutches, toilet frames, raised toilet seats, walking frames, bath seats, adjustable bath boards, commmodes, wheelchairs (electric and manual). Also offer: beds, high seat chairs, childrens equipment, lifting equipment, stairlifts, riser/recliner chairs, hoists, bath lifts, scooters and pressure relief cushions. Also provides repairs, parts and accessories. Full after sales service. Member of BHTA. Meeting room available for hire.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm, Sat 9am-5pm (appointments only outside these times)
